testcase.classname: To check weathermap site is working appropriately
testcase.name: E2E test to check all important information displayed on landing page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the page https://openweathermap.org/.......................passed When Page is appropriately loaded...........................................passed Then check city name input and search button is available...................passed Then check sample information is london is dispalyed........................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
